In the previous Counter Example we hard coded the dom update manualy, and of course this approach does not skill to complex applications,

There for, instead of manually update the DOM we're going to use React

To Start with react, we need to import Two important Libraries, The 'react' and 'react-dom' packages

For now as we're not using any Module bundler such as webpack or at task runner like gulp. we'll just import directly to 'index.html'

You can find the latest CDN libraries in the official React website
